overview: It's summer, it's hot, and the burning desires of Lya Missy, Carol Vega, Geishakyd, Lindsey Olsen, Martina Smeraldi and Taissia Shanti have cranked up to a whole new level! Sex is always on the cards with our scorching hot babes around, and whether it's a visit to an ice-cream parlour, an innocent trip to the forest, a raunchy photoshoot, or an afternoon by the pool, our girls don't try to escape the heat, they embrace it in some of hottest summer stories yet! Summer is Sex, dont miss it!
title: Summer is Sex
